mutants.code:
def min_jumps_to_reach_stairs(n: int) -> int:
    steps = 1
    size_of_step = 2
    while n > 0:
        steps += 1
        n -= size_of_step
        size_of_step += 1
    return steps

def min_jumps_to_reach_stairs(n: int) -> int:
    steps = -1
    size_of_step = 2
    while n > 0:
        steps += 1
        n -= size_of_step
        size_of_step += 1
    return steps
